title: Gap Needs Old Navy to Stay Afloat
sub_head: Once its standout performer, Old Navy has suddenly become a drag on Gap
body:
How much more stretch is left at Old Navy before Gap snaps?
Gap shares shed more than 20% Friday morning after the company said it was lowering guidance for its fiscal first quarter, citing challenges at Old Navy. It now expects sales to drop by at least 10% in the first quarter compared with a year earlier. Gap also said the current chief executive officer of Old Navy will leave her post this week.
